SCTX - Script Source:
scn fbmwTGCrimeGoldCheckNow

Begin Function {}
	set fbmwTGCrimeGoldDiscount.canPay to 0
	set fbmwTGCrimeGoldDiscount.discount to ( Player.GetCrimeGold / 2 )

	if ( Player.GetGold >= fbmwTGCrimeGoldDiscount.discount )
		set fbmwTGCrimeGoldDiscount.canPay to 1
	endif

End

;<CSEBlock>
;<CSECaretPos> 282 </CSECaretPos>
;</CSEBlock>
